A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A film about moody teenagers. 

Poor character/story development\, not engaged with the actors at any point. Story Line = Plot holes galore. 

Movie felt like a tacky advert to sell Disney merchandise\, for example the penguins with large eyes\, which repeatedly appeared for no apparent reason whatsoever. Another example would be the necklace\, which again was given far to much screen time\, and played no real importance in the movie. 

A Star Wars film by Disney is just an advert for toys\, just in time for filling up kids Christmas stockings.
